cast.overview: When college coach Herb Brooks is hired to helm the 1980 U.S. men's Olympic hockey team, he brings a unique and brash style to the ice. After assembling a team of hot-headed college all-stars, who are humiliated in an early match, Brooks unites his squad against a common foe: the heavily-favored Soviet team.
cast.title: Miracle

details.biography: Kenneth Wayne Dryden PC OC (born August 8, 1947) is a graduate of Cornell University and McGill Law School, a Hall-of-Fame and 6 time Stanley Cup champion goalie with the Montreal Canadiens, a lawyer, a former Member of Parliament and cabinet minister, an author and Officer of the Order of Canada. He was a member of Team Canada that beat the Soviets in the famed 1972 Summit Series.
details.name: Ken Dryden
